node.title: NT records its first COVID-19 case in a remote community. Here's what we know about the response
node.alt: A surgical face mask lying on the pavement.
node.description: Greater Katherine and the remote community of Robinson River have both entered a three-day lockdown after two people tested positive to COVID-19 yesterday. Here's what we know about the new cases and the response so far.
node.content:
["Greater Katherine and the remote community of Robinson River\u00a0have both entered a\u00a0three-day lockdown after two people tested positive for COVID-19 on Monday.", "The lockdowns, which started at 6pm on Monday, are due to lift at 6pm on Thursday.", "One of the new cases \u2014\u00a0a 30-year-old female resident of Robinson River \u2014 is believed to be the first case of COVID-19 in a Northern Territory remote community, which has long been a fear for\u00a0health experts.", "Here's what we know about the\u00a0new cases, and the response, so far.", "
What is known about the two new cases?
", "The first of the new cases is a 43-year-old Aboriginal man, who is fully vaccinated and has underlying health issues.", "He lives in Katherine East, where he resides\u00a0with seven other people, but he also\u00a0spends time in the\u00a0Robinson River\u00a0community.\u00a0", "The man initially tested negative to\u00a0COVID-19 on\u00a0November 9, but was re-tested on November 13 and returned a positive result yesterday.", "Health authorities say\u00a0he may have been infectious since November 10.\u00a0", "The other new case is a\u00a030-year-old Aboriginal woman who is unvaccinated.", "She is a Robinson River resident and flew into the community on November 11.\u00a0", "The woman came forward for testing after showing symptoms, and tested positive yesterday.\u00a0", "It's likely she has been\u00a0infectious in the Robinson River community since November 11.", "She is expected to be flown to Darwin for treatment.", "
Are new cases connected\u00a0to last week's\u00a0Darwin/ Katherine cluster?
", "Chief Minister Michael Gunner has said that, while it's likely the new\u00a0cases are linked to the recent Darwin/ Katherine cluster, there is a \"small possibility\" they are unconnected and there has been seeding in Katherine.", "That's because there isn't yet any clear link between the first case detected yesterday \u2014\u00a0the 43-year-old man \u2014\u00a0and previous cases that were part of the cluster.", "Authorities are also unsure if they're related because of the length of time that's passed between last week's cases\u00a0and these ones, as the early cases\u00a0were not out in the community after November 4.", "Because of this, they can't yet say whether the COVID viral fragments recently detected in Katherine wastewater samples came from the\u00a0new cases.", "
What's happening in Katherine?
", "The Greater Katherine region is\u00a0now\u00a0in a 72-hour lockdown, which started at 6pm yesterday.", "Residents will have to follow the same rules that were in place\u00a0during the Katherine lockdown a week ago, and roadblocks have\u00a0been put in place.", "Authorities are also urging any residents or recent visitors to Katherine who are showing COVID-19 symptoms\u00a0to come forward and get tested, after\u00a0the town recorded low testing numbers over the weekend.", "", "
Katherine is expected to be in lockdown until 6pm on Thursday.(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "
What's happening in Robinson River?
", "The Robinson River\u00a0community and surrounding homeland communities are also in\u00a0a 72-hour lockdown, as of\u00a06pm yesterday.\u00a0", "An eight-person rapid assessment team, made up of health experts and police\u00a0officers, has been flown into the community to test, vaccinate and otherwise support residents.\u00a0", "Mr Gunner has said the team is aiming to test every resident within the next few days,\u00a0and is also bringing extra vaccines so that any community member who wants one can get the jab.", "The team is also contacting and offering support to surrounding homeland communities part of the lockdown.", "According to\u00a0NT government figures, Robinson River currently has a first-dose vaccination rate of 77 per cent\u00a0and full vaccination rate of 60 per cent, both of which are higher than those of some other remote Territory communities.\u00a0", "
What about\u00a0Borroloola?
", "Borroloola, a large\u00a0remote community near Robinson River, is not currently in lockdown nor under any restrictions.", "Acting Chief Health Officer Charles Pain has said this is because no\u00a0positive cases have been recorded in the community and movement between it and Robinson River have been limited due to road conditions.", "However, Borroloola residents are being urged\u00a0to stay put in\u00a0the community for the next three days to help reduce the risk of transmission.", "
What are the lockdown rules?
", "Under the lockdown restrictions in Greater Katherine, Robinson River and surrounds, people can\u00a0only leave their homes for one of five reasons.", "These reasons are:\u00a0", "People are not permitted to travel outside of a lockdown area unless they have an exemption.", "", "
Strict mask rules will apply in Greater Katherine and Robinson River throughout the lockdown period.(ABC News: Liz Pickering)
", "
What are the rules around face masks? Have they changed?
", "A mask mandate has been in place in Katherine since the town came out of a lockout last Monday\u00a0and, while that mandate is still in\u00a0place, the rules are now a bit stricter.", "The same mandate has also been extended to\u00a0Robinson River and surrounding homeland areas.\u00a0", "People now have to wear a mask whenever they leave their homes, not just when they can't socially distance.", "However, Dr\u00a0Pain\u00a0said, masks\u00a0can be removed if you're doing \"vigorous exercise\".", "Not wearing a mask when you're supposed to could come with a hefty price tag \u2014\u00a0the penalty\u00a0is a $5,000 fine.", "
Any there any\u00a0exposure sites?
", "Northern Territory\u00a0authorities were still working to identify exposure sites last night.", "Four exposure sites were listed on the government's coronavirus\u00a0website late yesterday. They are:", "An up-to-date list of exposure sites can be found on the\u00a0Northern Territory\u00a0government's coronavirus\u00a0website.\u00a0", "
What else do we know?
", "According to the government's coronavirus website, in Katherine schools and childcare centres will only be\u00a0open for the children of essential workers during the lockdown period.", "In Robinson River, the school and early childhood services will be closed.", "Most businesses in both locations will be required to close.", "This includes retail outlets, gyms, pools and community centres.", "Cafes and\u00a0restaurants will be able to offer takeaway and delivery, but not dine-in service.", "People will need to check in, either using the Territory Check-In App or manually, at any venue they visit.", "", "
WA's COVID-19 reopening roadmap
"]
